languages.text: "Будь проклят тот день, когда Кунрад заступил на службу к Леди Теодоре... теперь по его вине Даргонус потерял целый корабль со всем экипажем!"
"Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"
languages.original_text: "Будь проклят тот день, когда Кунрад заступил на службу к Леди Теодоре... теперь по его вине Даргонус потерял целый корабль со всем экипажем!"

traits.locale_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我诅咒昆拉德为西奥多拉效力的那一天……如今，因为他的阴谋，达戈努斯又失去了一艘飞船，失去了船上的所有船员！”
languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

traits.locale_text: “我诅咒昆拉德为西奥多拉效力的那一天……如今，因为他的阴谋，达戈努斯又失去了一艘飞船，失去了船上的所有船员！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Maudit soit le jour où Kunrad est entré au service de dame Théodora... À cause de lui, Dargonus a perdu un vaisseau et tout un équipage ! »
languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

traits.locale_text: « Maudit soit le jour où Kunrad est entré au service de dame Théodora... À cause de lui, Dargonus a perdu un vaisseau et tout un équipage ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Maldigo el día en el que Kunrad entró al servicio de lady Theodora... ¡Ahora, por su culpa, Dargonus ha perdido una nave con toda su tripulación!».
languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

traits.locale_text: «Maldigo el día en el que Kunrad entró al servicio de lady Theodora... ¡Ahora, por su culpa, Dargonus ha perdido una nave con toda su tripulación!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「クンラッドがレディ・シオドーラの家臣となった日が悔やまれます…奴のおかげで、今やダルゴナスはシップ一隻をクルーごと失ったのですから！」
languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッドがレディ・シオドーラの家臣となった日が悔やまれます…奴のおかげで、今やダルゴナスはシップ一隻をクルーごと失ったのですから！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Verflucht sei der Tag, an dem Kunrad in Lady Theodoras Dienst eingetreten ist ... Nun hat Dargonus seinetwegen ein Schiff mit der gesamten Crew verloren!"
languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

traits.locale_text: "Verflucht sei der Tag, an dem Kunrad in Lady Theodoras Dienst eingetreten ist ... Nun hat Dargonus seinetwegen ein Schiff mit der gesamten Crew verloren!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

languages.text: "Kunrad'ın Leydi Theodora'nın hizmetine girdiği güne lanet olsun... Onun yüzünden Dargonus, koca bir gemiyi ve gemideki tüm mürettebatı kaybetti!"
languages.original_text: "Cursed be the day that Kunrad entered Lady Theodora's service... Now, because of him, Dargonus has lost a ship along with its entire crew!"

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad'ın Leydi Theodora'nın hizmetine girdiği güne lanet olsun... Onun yüzünden Dargonus, koca bir gemiyi ve gemideki tüm mürettebatı kaybetti!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
